headline: Jaundice Associated Symptoms
clinical_intent: To assess for associated gastrointestinal symptoms and changes in stool/urine color in a patient presenting with jaundice, to help differentiate causes of liver dysfunction.

content: When you press on your right upper abdomen, does the dull ache become sharper or does it radiate anywhere, like your shoulder or back?
answer: I've had a bit of a dull ache under my ribs, nothing sharp just heavy and my pee has been really dark like Coca-Cola this morning. My stool was pale, almost clay colored, that freaked me out.
headline: Urine/Stool Color Change
clinical_intent: To assess for changes in urine or stool color which may indicate liver or biliary dysfunction.

content: Is the jaw pain still present, and if so, can you describe its intensity and location? Have you seen a dentist since the abscess was treated?

headline: Jaw Pain Characterization
clinical_intent: To characterize the nature of jaw pain and assess for potential dental causes or complications.
